automation_yaml:
id: 'living_room_light_80pct_6pm'
alias: Living Room Light 80 Percent 6PM
description: "Between 6:00 PM and 11:00 PM every day, set the Living Room Light to 80% brightness."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '18:00:00'
conditions: []
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness_pct: 80
